chefs.name: Chef Isabella Martinez
chefs.bio: With over 15 years of culinary experience, Chef Isabella brings Mediterranean flavors to life using locally-sourced ingredients.

chefs.name: Chef James Chen
chefs.bio: A master of Asian fusion cuisine, Chef James combines traditional techniques with contemporary California flair.

chefs.name: Chef Sarah Williams
chefs.bio: Classically trained in French cuisine, Chef Sarah creates elegant dishes that celebrate Santa Barbara's finest ingredients.
